text: I thought I was getting betterBack in January I overdosed and survived  I had a few seizures and was brought to the hospital for a week  Nearly dying seemed to be the wake up call I needed and I seemed to be getting better  I realize now that I m not  My problems seem to have just gotten worse overall since then  I ve got so much to be happy and smile about but my own mind makes these things bad things  I see a single post on Reddit and my chest starts hurting and I nearly or do breakdown  I m scared of almost everything  especially losing my friends  despite the fact that I m constantly pushing them away  I overdosed again a while ago and made myself vomit the pills up after a friend got really pissed  I just wish something would kill me so I wouldn t be breaking my promises

text: Headed AwayJust writing things out  Feel so desperate  I dont know what s wrong with me  I don t know what to do  I need to study  but every time I get to doing it  I lose it  I can t focus and I break down randomly  In my car  in class  while I m biking  in the grocery  I m a fuckup  The only thing I had going for me were my grades  Now that s gone  Nothing left Even though it s cliche  I don t have anyone and family is basically nonexistent  The only people I care about are my professors  as lame as that is  They re good and interesting people who ve encouraged and helped me  But I m just a disappointment to everyone and I always will be  I m not capable of handling school or life in general  There s nothing I want in life  I don t have the will for anything I ve been thinking of just dropping out and abandoning my life here  Moving to a new state  a big city  Working full time  The professors would be the only people I d miss  But I don t want to be just another college dropout  Giving up now would just put me farther behind  Suicide seems like the only other option I don t know why I m posting here really  Human contact  I guess  Tell me about your day  What d you do at work  How s life  Whatever s clever  Someone  anyone  just talk at me  I can t be alone right now
summary: He's depressed. He's not capable of handling school or life in general. He doesn't have anyone and family is basically nonexistent. The only people he cares about are his professors. He considers moving to a new state or a big city and working full time.
